environment.label: Environment
environment.comment: In test mode your payments will not be sent to the bank.

rank.label: Rank number
rank.comment: Rank number provided by Sofinco3X (last 2 digits).

hmackey.label: HMAC
hmackey.comment: Secrete HMAC key to create using the Sofinco3X interface.

password.label: Sofinco3X Back Office password
password.comment: Back Office password provided by Sofinco3X.

passwordplus.label: Sofinco3X Back Office password
passwordplus.comment: Back Office password provided by Sofinco3X.

customer_info.label: Show payment information to customers
customer_info.comment: Sofinco3X module can show payment information to customer. You can disable this feature here.

currency.label: Orders currencies
currency.comment: If multiple currencies are active on your store you can force the payment with the base currency or the currency selected by the customer when ordering.

cron_status.label: Activate CRON to cancel orders
cron_status.comment: If Yes, the CRON will process all Sofinco3X orders awaiting payment to canceled status.

cron_time.label: Age of the orders (in minutes)
cron_time.comment: If the order is older then it will be processed.

cctypes.label: Card type
cctypes.comment: If you disable E-Carte Bleu, contact the Sofinco3X support

tds_info.label: Make sure that the contract signed with your bank allows 3-D Secure before proceeding with setup.

tds_active.label: Enable 3-D Secure
tds_active.comment:
Warning: your bank may enforce 3-D Secure.
Make sure your setup is coherent with your bank, Sofinco3X and Magento module.

info.label: Check your Sofinco3X contract before enabling this option.

cctypes.label: Card type
cctypes.comment: If you disable E-Carte Bleu, contact the Sofinco3X support

tds_info.label: Make sure that the contract signed with your bank allows 3-D Secure before proceeding with setup.

tds_active.label: Enable 3-D Secure
tds_active.comment:
Warning: your bank may enforce 3-D Secure.
Make sure your setup is coherent with your bank, Sofinco3X and Magento module.

sf3xep_prepaid.label: Pay by Saving or Prepaid Ticket

sf3xep_financial.label: Pay by Card and Means of Financing

tds_info.label: 3-D Secure is mandatory for this payment method.
3-D Secure is mandatory for this payment method.
